title: Spyder Auto Installation: 2008-11 Mercedes-Benz C-Class [W204] Projector LED DRL Headlights
description: This video demonstrates how to install a set of Spyder Auto's projector halo/angel eye headlights on any 2008-11 Mercedes-Benz C-Class. This complete walkthrough guides you through the entire install process from start to finish and offers helpful tips throughout to facilitate a successful installation. This video demonstrates how to install a set of Projector Headlights from Spyder Auto on a W204-chassis Mercedes Benz C-Class Installation and removal of headlights requires removing the front bumper, so this video is also a helpful guide for removing the front bumper and the grille as well. Follow along for each step of the process.
tags: Spyder LED Headlights, projector headlights, Mercedes C-Class, how to install headlights
